name: Rbuv
body:
# Rbuv

libuv binding for Ruby.

## Installation

Add this line to your application's Gemfile:

    gem 'rbuv'

And then execute:

    $ bundle

Or install it yourself as:

    $ gem install rbuv

5. Create new Pull Request
